summary:
Slytherin: huff, what are you doing? It’s 3:00 am now.
Hufflepuff: I have to finish my homework.
Slytherin: what? Why haven’t...
body:
Slytherin: huff, what are you doing? It’s 3:00 am now.

Hufflepuff: I have to finish my homework.

Slytherin: what? Why haven’t you done them earlier?

Hufflepuff: *sigh* I helped some people with theirs and I barely had time to finish mine.

Slytherin: the world does not deserve you.

Slytherin: *smiles and sits next to hufflepuff* how can I help?

Hufflepuff: you would give up your sleep time to help me?

Slytherin: *shrugs* I guess.

Hufflepuff: that’s really sweet. A+ on friendship.

Slytherin: as if I could get anything else.

summary: Quote: “It was a c-cat hair!” she howled. “M-Millicent Bulstrode m-must have a cat! And the P-Potion isn’t supposed to be used...

summary: I’m sure someone has already pointed this out but I just figured that the Pevensies represent the Hogwarts houses. I came up...
body:
Just a thought

I’m sure someone has already pointed this out but I just figured that the Pevensies represent the Hogwarts houses. I came up with this thought while trying to choose whether to watch Harry Potter or Narnia.

Lucy is Hufflepuff

Susan is Ravenclaw

Peter is Gryffindor

Edmund is Slytherin


Lucy is kind, gentle and loyal like a Hufflepuff. Susan is smart and clever like a Ravenclaw(they mean like the same thing but oh well). Peter is brave and a natural leader like a Gryffindor. Edmund is cunning and ambitious like a Slytherin.

This took me way too long to figure out lmao.

summary:
Sirius: This party sucks, it was a 15 minute line to get to the buffet and when I got there I slipped on a giant booger! 
Remus:...
body:
Sirius: This party sucks, it was a 15 minute line to get to the buffet and when I got there I slipped on a giant booger!

Remus: Are.. Are you sure it wasn’t an oyster?

Sirius: I guess it could have been, I didn’t really look at it.

Sirius: I just wiped it on James’ coat and got the hell out of there.

blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: What It Means To Me
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Z3BpOD

by Samunderthelights

It has been two months since the Battle of Hogwarts, and Remus has moved away to live on his own. Far away from anyone else, to make sure he can’t hurt anyone. Because everyone around him seems to get hurt, or killed, and he feels cursed. This way, he will be able to protect the people he loves. But he is running away again. Just like he had done, all those years ago.
But when someone from his past comes back into his life, he will have to face the reality. There is no more running away.

—

This is the sequel to ‘Need You Tonight’. I guess it can be read on its own, but I’m not a 100% sure. So I would recommend checking out 'Need You Tonight’ before this one. =)

Words: 1686, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: wolfstar, Post-Battle of Hogwarts, Angst, Fluff and Angst, Sirius Black Lives, Remus Lupin Lives, Werewolf Remus Lupin, Gay Remus Lupin, Bisexual Sirius Black, Friendship/Love, First Love, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Past Violence, Hogwarts, Fluffy Ending


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Z3BpOD

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

tags: love and other unsafe medical practices
summary: Love and Other Unsafe Medical Practices - Tedah - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: Love and Other Unsafe Medical Practices - Tedah - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley
Characters: Harry Potter, Draco Malfoy, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Andromeda Black Tonks, Teddy Lupin, Blaise Zabini
Additional Tags: Healer Draco Malfoy, Auror Harry Potter, Auror Ron Weasley, Harry Potter is a reckless idiot, Healing, Injury Recovery, Accidental Bonding, Magically Powerful Harry Potter, Minor Character Death, Canonical Character Death, Post-War, Harry Potter Epilogue What Epilogue | EWE, Unconventional Medical Practices, Light Dom/sub, competent Draco Malfoy, Pining, Occlumency
Summary:

Love is a lot like surgery: sometimes you have to take risks to succeed and most times there are unexpected side effects.

Harry is back in a hospital room after an Auror sting gone wrong and nobody is amused at this point. It’s starting to become somewhat of a familiar scene for Ron and Hermione. This time his healer is one Draco Malfoy so it’s actually a /little/ funny when something goes wrong during recovery.

Chapter two is up. The work is growing bigger than I anticipated and it’s shaping into something recognizable.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
